<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.06</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Groups </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> global </value></part><part><name>Multiplayer Arguments</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> global </value></part><part><name>Multiplayer Effects</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Join all units in the array to given group silently (without radio message). To have a group member leave a group, join him with the [[grpNull]] group (e.g. <tt>[guy1] [[joinSilent]] [[grpNull]]</tt>), but '''beware''', as brand new group is created for the leaving unit and this could result in the number of groups in a mission growing out of control. </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> unitArray '''joinSilent''' group </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> unitArray: [[Array]] - units to join group </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> group: [[Object]] or [[Group]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[_unitOne, _unitTwo] [[joinSilent]] ([[group]] [[player]]);</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>[_unitOne, _unitTwo] [[joinSilent]] [[player]];</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE2</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[join]], [[joinAs]], [[joinAsSilent]], [[group]], [[leader]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>

</value></part></template>

<dd class="note">
